comments:
Build I20040210 (8pm)
- if the Java Perspective is open, then close it and reopen it
- click on the JUnit fast view icon on the toolbar and the following NPE occurs.
- restarting seems to make the view work in the fast view bar.
- making another view (e.g. outline) into a fastview also works

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 Feb 11, 2004 14:14:42.94

This occurs in the New Look only on GTK as well.
works on MOTIF when not running with the New Look jars
On Windows XP occurs with New Look only according to Wool Queen
